name: StaticString
desc: A string type designed to represent text that is known at compile time.

items.name: customMirror
items.desc: The custom mirror for this instance.

items.name: debugDescription
items.desc: A textual representation of the static string, suitable for debugging.

items.name: description
items.desc: A string representation of the static string.

items.name: hasPointerRepresentation
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the static string stores a pointer to ASCII or UTF-8 code units.

items.name: isASCII
items.desc: A Boolean value that is true if the static string stores a pointer to ASCII code units.

items.name: utf8CodeUnitCount
items.desc: The length in bytes of the static string’s ASCII or UTF-8 representation.

items.name: utf8Start
items.desc: A pointer to the beginning of the string’s UTF-8 encoded representation.
